greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of connected regular graphs with n nodes and girth at least 8.
reference: M. Meringer, Fast Generation of Regular Graphs and Construction of Cages. Journal of Graph Theory, 30 (1999), 137-146.
link: Jason Kimberley, Connected regular graphs with girth at least 8
Jason Kimberley, Index of sequences counting connected k-regular simple graphs with girth at least g
formula: a(n) = sum of the n-th row of A186718.
xref: Connected regular graphs of any degree with girth at least g: A005177 (g=3), A186724 (g=4), A186725 (g=5), A186726 (g=6), A186727 (g=7), this sequence (g=8), A186729 (g=9).
Connected k-regular simple graphs with girth at least 8: this sequence (any k), A186718 (triangle); specific k: A185118 (k=2), A014376 (k=3).
results.author: _Jason Kimberley_, Nov 25 2011
